title: Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds’ Valentine’s Day plans are chill couple goals
text:
Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds’ Valentine’s Day plans are chill couple goals Being that we’ve all been dying to know, we’re thrilled to learn that Blake Lively shared her Valentine’s Day plans with Ryan Reynolds at L’Oréal Paris’ Galentine’s Day party for New York Fashion Week Monday night .
And, well, they’re about as low-key as you probably expected from a Hollywood golden couple that seems to enjoy hanging out at home with their two daughters even more than fancy red carpet premieres. 
“We haven’t really planned anything yet,” Lively told reporters, adding that her main plans this week revolve around she and Reynolds hosting her sister, Robyn, who also attended the Galentine’s fest. “He’s the luckiest man ever.” 
♥️Happy Gal -entines Day ❤ 
A post shared by Blake Lively (@blakelively) on Feb 13, 2017 at 8:27pm PST 
A chill, stay-in Valentine’s Day with your spouse — who just-so-happens to be Ryan Freaking Reynolds — and your best Galentine? 
Count us in.
Lively also spoke on why she’s been getting involved in causes like the Women’s March lately, speaking frankly about how this is the first time in her life that she’s actually noticed the need for feminism.
“This is the first time in my lifetime where I have been aware of a women’s worth being questioned,” Lively began.
I know it happens all the time everywhere, but I never felt it. It’s made me so much more aware and empathetic to the challenges that women face always, because I’ve been really fortunate. I think it’s just so important that we come together and build each other up — and that we remind women of their value. It’s really beautiful to see women come together. It’s something I’ve never seen.”
